content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Coal Mine at position(16.0, 0.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position 16.0, 0.0)
- Chest (position 16.5, 1.5) to collect coal
- Inserter (position 17.5, 1.5) to transfer coal from chest

#### Additional Coal Mine at position(17.0, 4.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position 17.0, 4.0)
- Chest and inserter (position near 17.0, 4.0) to collect and transfer coal

#### Additional Coal Mine at position(20.0, 4.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position 20.0, 4.0)
- Chest and inserter (position near 20.0, 4.0) to collect and transfer coal

#### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 7.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 0.5) to pump water
- Boiler (position -5.0, 3.5) to generate steam
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 7.5) to generate electricity
- Pipe group connecting offshore pump to boiler and boiler to steam engine

#### Electricity distribution
Consists of 
- Small electric poles connecting steam engine to the coal mines

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when using undefined variables
  - Ensure that all variables are defined before using them
* Output blocked by item on the ground
  - Ensure that there is a sink entity in place to accept the output
* Chest is full
  - Empty the chest to continue mining
* Entity is not plugged into the electric network
  - Ensure that the entity is connected to the electric network
* Out of fuel
  - Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel to generate steam

### NAMESPACE

* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
